dict.string:
Everything only works when WhatsApp is running in the background. Turn on this option to make sure it is always running. It may decrease battery life. You can also choose to run WhatsApp yourself, but please note that it will be suspended in the background if you don't open it periodically.
This is a more serious example extension for Couria. Source code available on Github (https://github.com/Qusic/WhatsAppForCouria).
If you like my work, please consider donating. ;)
